Reviews.Title: HD Security camerea deal
Reviews.Author: Tamara Tipton
Reviews.Content: I bought this set of 4 HD cameras to replace some of my aging ones. I am more than pleased with the quality of the picture and the range of the night vision is excellent. I was pleasantly surprised when I turned hooked up the first one. The picture was very clear, colors are vivid and most important to me are in focus up close and far away. Night vision is bright enough to read wording on a t-shirt at about 50 feet in a confined area such as a within a fenced, (privacy fence) in area, however if the area is "open ground" the night vision will illuminate the area but, in my case, fine detail is sacrificed. You are Still able to easily follow the movements of the subject its just not able to "ID" an individual at approx. 75 to 100 feet out. In my case 3 of the 4 cameras work beautifully the fourth has an IR issue at range, but for the price I paid I can live with it. Hope this helped you with the decision to buy or not.

Reviews.Title: Liked it so much I bought a second set
Reviews.Author: D. Darby
Reviews.Content: Installed a set in the front yard (the hard part is determining best location) connected to a video server (http://www.amazon.com/IP-Network-Server-Broadcast-without/dp/B000HBVTCA) and running 'motion' on my Linux server and liked the results so much that I bought another set (and another video server) for the back/side yards.  The daylight color looks quite good, the nighttime black/white IR is also sharp (for about 25') and then fuzzy but recognizable shapes (cat v human) until about 50'.  I liked the idea of no moving parts (i.e., less chance of breakage) so choose the Defender brand.  I'm glad I did, they are metal (no plastic) and fill solid, hide the cord and perform well for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Security camera system
Reviews.Author: JOHN L. LAVERY
Reviews.Content: This security system was simple to install, and works better than the ones at my school and a local organization where I am an officer.  The images are very clear and the night vision works well also.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Dale Jag
Reviews.Content: 2 of the 4 cameras did not work when I got them.  2 different problems.  One had an outside temperature problem and the other did not work in low light at all.  Their 24 help line is a joke.  Noone will ever answer the phone, it's just a recording.  I don't call that support.  Had to E mail them and 5 days later I got a response asking me to explain the problem further.  The first time was clear enough.  When the temperature outside was above 90, I would get vertical lines on the picture.  Enough said.  Then they told me where to mail the cams back and they would decide if they were bad.  I had to pay the postage and it was going to take 30 days to get a response back from them.  With all the hassle I got with them, I would NEVER buy from them again!  Total junk!

Reviews.Title: Electronic Technician Review..
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Each camera runs on 12 volts / 500 milliamps. The power supply that comes in the box is 12 volts / 2 Amps, (but in reality is probably only pushing 1.8 amps). This would explain why some people are having a problems powering the 4th camera, because it doesn't have enough current. Fortunately, i was lucky and i was able to power ALL my cameras with that one power supply.The screws that came with the cameras are weak and almost too small.The camera's IR LED's are surprisingly noticeable during night vision operation.Still, the best camera's for the money..

Reviews.Title: Decent system just wish they had a different support model
Reviews.Author: rnwes
Reviews.Content: This is pretty much as advertised, The cameras do the job. You're not going to have amazing clarity or spectacular night vision but for the purposes of monitoring the exterior of your home, they do the trick.The only issue I've had is that one camera was defective out of the box.  I called support but never had the opportunity to speak with anyone, just instructed by recording to open a ticket with Defender's support group.  The turn-around time could definitely be better but they did send me another camera.  I paid for shipping to Defender, they paid shipping back to me.I would say for an entry level security camera system this one works but if you're looking for fast turn around with support you may want to research reviews a little more for a manufacturer with a different support model.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Eden "Mr. Cadman"
Reviews.Content: Originally purchased system with 4 cameras. The Defender system we purchased had options for 8 cameras. We purchased these Ultra High resolution cameras and made the original cameras look good during the day but the difference is at night. Super resolution. If you are going to get cameras for the Defender system you have to get these camera.

Reviews.Title: very nice cameras
Reviews.Author: Andres Felipe Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: cameras with very good resolution, the LEDs provide good lighting, allows for excellent day and night vision, are very safe and necessary

Reviews.Title: Dont buy
Reviews.Author: the grouch
Reviews.Content: These cameras are junk. They work long enought for you not to beable to return them. Camera has burnt out and does not work. I would reccomend purchasing this kind of product from a store where you can take them back if you have issues. They were easy to install and mount. That is the only good thing I can say about them.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras!
Reviews.Author: Peter Chitan
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great quality. The night vision is exceptional. The colors are vivid and the images sharp. I have bought these on two other occasions from Defender.com and also from Amazon in the past. I am well pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent indoor night vision in total darkness!
Reviews.Author: ES
Reviews.Content: Overall quality is very good! No complaints. Great value! Will purchase again. One minor issue is that it's a little noisy when it switches to night vision, like a loud shutter noise. When you turn on lights it switches back.

Reviews.Title: Night Vision not working
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of these cameras and the night vision is not sharp. One of the cameras was defected. I did not want to send it back because it's pain with shipping and handling.

Reviews.Title: great camera system .
Reviews.Author: LYNNE SUBJECK
Reviews.Content: clean clear images . easy to install . no complaints .I get compliments all the time about the clarity , even from a woman that worked at another camera surveillance company . im thrilled ! (also feel better about leaving my home now !)

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Thomas T. Whaley Jr. "tom98685"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the results....installation was a little time consuming but that is based on your application. Otherwise installation was pretty easy, everything worked out of the box, video quality is very good overall, software on DVR is relatively simple and robust. I have not hooked it up to the internet yet. Not sure if I will. Anyway for the money I think it is a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Adam aka Gommer "Adam"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to watch the parking lot for my manger and we have already caught offenders and the camera works great although it seems there no zoom capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Great camera pack
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Cameras work well in daylight, color is off a little, most likely due to IR feature for night.The IR illumination covers a good area and lights back yard.Picture quality is excellent.Would highly recommend and will most likely order more if available in whilte

Reviews.Title: Additional cameras
Reviews.Author: Ben Burke
Reviews.Content: Do you ever order something but realize later you didn't order enough?  Yep, that's what happened.  I ordered Defender's 8 channel, 4 camera Pro surveillance system (21112), and then realized four cameras would not be enough.  For some reason, Defender doesn't sell the camera that came with my system separately, so I had to order this four pack of cameras.  This camera is almost identical.  It also records with 600 lines of resolution and is sufficient as an add-on to my existing system.  The only problem I had was I needed a slightly longer cable for one run.  65' was not quite long enough, so I had to order a 100' cable separately.  So now I've got six cameras working 24 hours a day watching outside my house.  I sleep better at night.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: tvmedic911
Reviews.Content: Great - Clear Picture. (Color/ Black & White) Would purchase again. Recommend to anyone needing security for your home or place of business.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from 420 lines, but not perfect.
Reviews.Author: HarveyH47
Reviews.Content: My previous cameras were adequate during the day, pitiful at night, but functional.  Bought a more modern DVR, with 8 channels, instead of the current 4 cameras.  The Defender cameras give a much nicer view, the playback is about the same on the old DVR (haven't swapped them out yet), hoping it's just the old compression of the video.The lenses that came with these was kind of narrow field 6-8 mm, but was simple to change the lenses from the previous cameras, 3.6 mm.  A little wider would have been nice, but not worth buying.The power supply for the cameras was a little weak for 4 cameras.  I've got 3 cameras running fine off it, the fourth is using the supply from on of the old cameras.  Didn't notice, until the first night, and one camera's IR illumination wasn't working.  Pretty noticeable, since it was in the carport.  Was still getting an image though, only took a moment to resolve.  They do work well at night.Will probably buy another 4 pack of these soon after I get the 8-channel DVR installed.  These are good cameras for home use, not sure if I'll be able to read license plate numbers, or get fine detail, but much better than what I had.

Reviews.Title: best deal on amazon
Reviews.Author: rfogarasi
Reviews.Content: Cameras were clear, just as specs advertise. Hooked up to a geovision pc card so far work great.  Perfect for home or small business security.

Reviews.Title: great cameras with  great clarity
Reviews.Author: vipergts_r_92
Reviews.Content: Great price for a set of cameras with good 30foot night vision and great clarity. this set of camers is the most practical set if you need to have security camers

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Harold Brown "Hman"
Reviews.Content: first of all, i have 3 different models of defender cameras.  mostly due to adding to my system and upgrading.Pro - great looking pic during the daytime, colors accurate, finally a solid bracket, heavier cablesCon - bracket will not allow under eve mounting (upside down).  must mount on wall.  also night vision is not improved over their cheaper versions. switches to night mode too early.  my cheaper defender models are in color and look better at dusk when these actually switch to night mode (black and white) which doesn't look as good.overall worth it and if i didn't have the cheaper models to compare to then would probably be satisfied.

Reviews.Title: still with problems
Reviews.Author: Randall E. Garcia Arias
Reviews.Content: one of the cameras ..did work at all. :( same message of the dvr...do not waste your money do not Purchase nothing from this brand.. SVAT..really have problems .. i told you!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced-resolution cameras provide crisp and detailed video
Monitor up to 100 feet away in complete darkness with automatic night vision
Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
Anti-vandal mount ensures camera cables cannot be tampered with
Easily connect to DVR with 65-foot cables to allow greater flexibility in camera situating
ProductInfo.Name: DEFENDER 21006 Ultra High Resolution Outdoor Security Cameras - 4 Pack
